paper_abstract: IMSP is an integrated water pollutant discharge permit (WPDP) management system based on hybrid mode of Client/Server (C/S) and Browser/Server (B/S) models. IMSP provides a platform/system for both firms and Environmental Protection Bureaus (EPBs) to manage permit and can dramatically elevate the efficiency of water pollutant discharge permit management. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All tights reserved.
paper_title: IMSP: Integrated management system for water pollutant discharge permit based on a hybrid C/S and B/S model
